nodes.bodyText: We need a production release, not a dev release.  Have they done production releases of this library yet?

We started tagging every commit as a release in discovery because it doesn't change often. So that build referenced is not a snapshot and won't change.
No objections to someone going through the usual release steps if you need it to have a better looking version number though.
I need the updates I made in order for it to work with besu so existing prod releases can't be used right now.

I've been fairly consistent when it comes to not shipping SNAPSHOT libraries.  While dev-commit provides more repeatability it doesn't have the creator stamp of "we think it's done" that a plain old version does.
